item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 18, 2025 at 3:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. On David Lynch's Revenge of the Jedi (111 points | 22 comments)
2. I helped fix sleep-wake hangs on Linux with AMD GPUs (510 points | 139 comments)
3. Plane crashes, overturns during landing at Toronto airport (153 points | 210 comments)
4. You're not a senior engineer until you've worked on a legacy project (2023) (583 points | 342 comments)
5. A web platform for using YouTube as a drum sequencer (11 points | 1 comment)
6. Privacy Is Not Dead: Beware the All-or-Nothing Mindset (120 points | 29 comments)
7. List of DRM-Free Bookshops (142 points | 36 comments)
8. Setting up a trusted, self-signed SSL/TLS certificate authority in Linux (55 points | 14 comments)
9. Visualize Ownership and Lifetimes in Rust (33 points | 3 comments)
10. Launch HN: Roark (YC W25) – Taking the pain out of voice AI testing (40 points | 24 comments)
11. Debugging an Undebuggable App (203 points | 32 comments)
12. Spacetime maps: A map that warps to show travel time (100 points | 20 comments)
13. NES86 – IBM PC Emulator for the NES (70 points | 16 comments)
14. Watch R1 "think" with animated chains of thought (160 points | 55 comments)
15. 670nm red light exposure improved aged mitochondrial function, colour vision (8 points | discuss)
16. Find Your 2%Ers (49 points | 22 comments)
17. TestRigor (YC S21) Is Hiring VP of Engineering ( | hide)
18. Who carved South America's mysterious ancient tunnels? [pdf] (74 points | 36 comments)
19. Why Quantum Cryptanalysis is Bollocks [pdf] (69 points | 50 comments)
20. Dedekind's Subtle Knife (15 points | 9 comments)
21. Espargos: ESP32-based WiFi sensing array (138 points | 22 comments)
22. 0+0 > 0: C++ thread-local storage performance (129 points | 75 comments)
23. Open source projects could sell SBOM fragments (89 points | 51 comments)
24. New Technology Reveals Details About Indigenous Habitations in Desert Canyons (14 points | 1 comment)
25. George Eliot's reflections on AGI from 1879 (119 points | 42 comments)
26. The San Francisco stadium that fog killed (52 points | 33 comments)
27. NLRB acting general counsel rescinds non-compete labor policy (111 points | 58 comments)
28. Police arrest apparent leader of cultlike 'Zizian' group linked to killings (116 points | 80 comments)
29. Large Language Models Show Concerning Tendency to Flatter Users (39 points | 31 comments)
30. Making Markets on Kalshi (49 points | 17 comments)
